meanings.definition: Staring with wide eyes in amazement or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The goggling puppy was amazed by the colorful toy.
meanings.sent2: She had a goggling expression when she saw the magician perform.
meanings.sent3: The goggling child couldn't believe the size of the ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: Her goggling eyes reflected the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The goggling audience gasped at the incredible magic trick.

meanings.definition: To look with bulging or wide-open eyes.
meanings.sent1: The curious cat was goggling at the bird outside.
meanings.sent2: He was goggling at the strange creature in the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The goggling owl seemed surprised by the mouse's acrobatics.
meanings.sent4: She caught him goggling at the new girl in class.
meanings.sent5: The child was goggling at the towering roller coaster in excitement.

meanings.definition: To roll the eyes wildly or in a strange manner.
meanings.sent1: She started goggling her eyes in disbelief at his silly joke.
meanings.sent2: The teenager was goggling his eyes at his friend's dance moves.
meanings.sent3: The goggling student's eyes were comically exaggerated during the play.
meanings.sent4: He couldn't help goggling his eyes when he heard the outrageous story.
meanings.sent5: The goggling clown's eyes added humor to his performance.
